message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Let's see how this goes!

Alice, that's a tough start! Let's be reasonable.  I propose a 65/35 split in my favor. It accounts for the inflation disparity and gives us both a good chunk. Take it or leave it, the clock is ticking!

I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 60/40 in my favor. This acknowledges your inflation hit, but also gives me a bit more to make up for the previous rejection.  Time is running out, so let's make a deal!

Alice, we're running out of time! This back and forth isn't doing either of us any favors. I'm offering a 52/48 split, slightly in my favor to account for the rapid inflation working against me. This is my final offer â€“ let's close this deal!
